alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Freestone; Henderson; Navarro (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 09 at 1:50AM CDT until September 09 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Freestone County in central Texas... South central Henderson County in central Texas... Northwestern Anderson County in central Texas... East central Navarro County in north central Texas... * Until 245 AM CDT. * At 150 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of Trinidad Lake, or 16 miles southwest of Athens, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Trinidad, Montalba, Coon Creek Lake, Trinidad Lake, Richland-Chambers Reservoir, Brushy Creek, Cross Roads, Johnson, Bradford, Bois D`arc, Blackfoot, Cayuga, Yard, Springfield, Bethel, Massey Lake, and Tennessee Colony. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
